subject: EASIA
title: The Political Economy of East Asia
description: This course explores the rise of the East Asian economy since the end of World War II.  The subject is pursued through examining some of the most important aspects of the so-called Asian miracle/model, including the historical background of the Asian miracle, the role of the state in the region's economic development, the relationship between Asian culture and economic development, social development, and East Asia's business system and practice.
